data: {"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3547743,"name":"","username":"emoser","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/emoser/{size}/209198_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-05T00:07:15.299Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eMy team is attempting to use \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eYAGSL\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Yet Another Generic Swerve Library\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e for our swerve this year. Last year we succeeded using the same thing but this year it does not seem to work. We have gotten the swerve to a point where the modules all work properly with each other, but we have problems with the heading of the robot affecting the forward drive direction. We have went through the 8 steps and multiple of them got us to the same point where it works at a 0 degree or 180 degree angle, but is incorrect at any other angle. When looking at the posted numbers on shuffleboard, they are counterclockwise negative, both the raw and adjusted values, even after setting the invertIMU in config to true and back to false. In the \u003cspan class=\"abbreviation\"\u003eYAGSL\u003ctemplate class=\"tooltiptext\" data-text=\"Yet Another Generic Swerve Library\"\u003e\u003c/template\u003e\u003c/span\u003e files it appears that the gyro heading should be rotated using the unaryMinus in the gyro class, but that does not seem to be taking affect. What else can we try in order to fix this issue? Thanks for all help.\u003c/p\u003e","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":2,"updated_at":"2025-03-05T00:07:15.299Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":4,"reads":22,"readers_count":21,"score":24.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":494267,"topic_slug":"problems-with-inverting-gyro-in-yagsl","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":62845,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"post_url":"/t/problems-with-inverting-gyro-in-yagsl/494267/1","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3547747,"name":"","username":"emoser","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/emoser/{size}/209198_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-05T00:09:11.904Z","cooked":"\u003cp\u003eI realized I forgot to link our codebase.
